attributes.action: stop the closure of pendragon special needs school in lewisham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Sir

Under government legislation and inclusion in education, our local LEA are proposing under Special Eductaional Needs Review to close our school. We had an excellent Ofsted and have Specialist school status in Humanities. Our school WORKS!!!!! Come and see the excellent work done by students and staff in our school!!!

Vanessa Cawe
